description.value:
You're @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Fascinated] by artifacts that originate from bygone eras, and you've even learned to craft functional replicas of them. You might be a xenoarchaeologist or a historian, or perhaps you're a reenactor creating period-accurate costumes and props.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the Crafting skill and the Gap Lore skill or a Lore skill related to your field of study. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Specialty Crafting] skill feat.
